meanings.definition: Slightly fat or chubby in a pleasing way.
meanings.sent1: The puppy looked pudgier after eating all the treats.
meanings.sent2: She felt pudgier in her winter sweater.
meanings.sent3: The teddy bear looked pudgier than the real bear!
meanings.sent4: The clouds seemed pudgier as they gathered in the sky.
meanings.sent5: The cake was pudgier with extra frosting on top.

meanings.definition: Having a slightly larger or rounder shape than is usual or normal.
meanings.sent1: The cat appeared pudgier after a big meal.
meanings.sent2: The vase looked pudgier with the new flowers in it.
meanings.sent3: The balloon animal became pudgier as more air was blown into it.
meanings.sent4: The tree looked pudgier with all the apples hanging from its branches.
meanings.sent5: The pillow seemed pudgier after being fluffed up.
